action-profile-capability.label: List network element interfaces on path to target network element

response-profile-capability.description: Period of updating the data inside this application
Represents the first entry in the list of releases
Represents the second entry in the list of releases
Represents the third entry in the list of releases
Calculated mount names and interfaces of devices on the path to the MAC address. Mount names and interfaces are separated by colons. Value pairs are are separated by semicolons.

integer-profile-capability.integer-name: Number of concurrent RPCs (MAC tables of several network elements get retrieved in parallel)
Timeout for receiving the response of the RPC
Maximum number of retries for executing an RPC

http-server-interface-capability.application-purpose: Retrieves and stores MAC address table contents and provides it to other applications
